name: 2kings
text: is so fresh!

name: mc_white
text: I will place you in the vegetable drawer in my refrigerator and leave you there until you are... SO fresh

name: em2
text: The second panel does have a Vlad feel to it.

name: cracklewater
text:
I got Vlad and LB mixed up in my early readings and the inside of my head bestowed a generic eastern European accent upon LB.
It was several hundred strips before I realised my mistake.

name: roastbeet
text: The beet is always fresh

name: deimosrising
text: Sometimes it can be hard to tell if you have gotten fresh or not; I have this problem

name: mortshire
text: still relevant today!

name: ambala
text: As an American, it is Phillipe's god-given right to get fresh with the fine women.

name: a_dude
text: I think so too... but is it a question or a statement from the five year old philippe?

name: f1shst1ck
text: Oh Philippe when will you learn?

name: iorek
text: Phillipe looks genuinely concerned.

name: spectre
text: Waaaaaait . . . this is the second time Lie Bot has told the frickin' truth!

name: norrin
text: Mixing lies with the truth is key in deceiving people.

name: coco
text: No I'm pretty sure this time Lie Bot was only telling the truth about other people wanting to kill Americans . . . all that stuff about vocab and fine women is just a myth!

name: purplehaze
text: Phillipe has no idea what 'getting fresh with fine women' is, but he assumes he's done it, because he's a patriotic otter.

name: jujubeesforjesus
text: A patriotter, if you will

name: kkrusty
text: i am glad to say that i am personally responsible for this strip getting a 3.9 instead of a 3.8.   i mean come on people.

name: feetnotes
text: Does Lie Bot look really small in this one?

name: professorhazard
text: Naa. Philippe just looks huge.

name: snowman
text: He's standing in a hole.  A "lie hole."

name: chuchurocket
text: i've always enjoyed the expression "getting fresh".  especially because it doesn't seem as if anything resulting from the whole affair could even remotely be refferred to as "fresh".

name: brzbee
text: Lie Bot: A True American Patriot.

name: wharfrat
text: ever notice how phillpe is always looking at you in the early strips

name: tekende
text: Damnit now I see it too!

name: jonnay
text: If alt-text existed at this point: "The otter thinks he knows about getting fresh with fine women."

name: dropkickpikachu
text: This one's pretty good, but it feels like there's a fourth panel just hiding somewhere, waiting to reveal itself and make us chuckle just that much more.

name: lawbot
text: I believe liebot actually represents American political discourse. Think about everything he has ever said, except for the clitoris.

name: dovey
text: Not except. Especially the clitoris.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
::ahem::

CLITS

name: niraj
text: I love how Phillipe isn't sure whether he gets fresh with the fine women or not

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
I really, really wish that the right to "get fresh with the fine women" was somewhere in the Constitution.

Come on, government, make my day.

name: tekende
text: Convicted felons are not allowed to get fresh with the fine women. Convicted felons caught getting fresh can be sentenced to pay a fine of up to $10,000 or spend five years in prison.

name: atticusonline
text: Try what I did, only $10K up front.

name: aristagoras
text: The Frank Miller view of American foreign relations.

name: sparhawk
text: THESS...! EZZ...! fresh?

name: sparhawk
text: He'll have a jolly good try anyway.

name: ryanfuss
text: Lie bot is so arrogant in his theory, he doesn't even realise by now that Phillipe is just simple.

name: miaou
text: That's precisely what Lie Bot's all about.

name: ketelcat
text: Aaw Phillipe! He hopes he hasn't let America down.

name: ham_shoes
text: Philippe is going to have to start wrapping his head around these ideas.  He can't remain five forever...  Oh, never mind

name: zapatos
text: Ultra Peanut was so fine!

name: lolsworth
text:
This strip is a haunting reminder that this comic was created only weeks after 9/11, as if Onstad himself was standing defiant in the face of terror yelling "YOU SHALL NOT WIN! WE WILL NEVER BOW OUR HEADS! PHILIPPE IS FIVE!"

NEVAR FORGET

name: atilla
text: I have yet to figure out if that is Lie Bots nose or mouth.

name: origotoshi
text: How could that be a mouth?
